Class EngineController

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.engine.EngineController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/engine") public class EngineController extends Object
REST controller for handling editor engine-related API endpoints. Provides endpoints for managing text editing operations such as selection, insertion, deletion, cut, copy, paste, and undo/redo functionalities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    EngineController(EngineService engineService)
    Constructs an EngineController with the specified engine service.

    • EngineController

      public EngineController(EngineService engineService)
      Constructs an EngineController with the specified engine service.
      Parameters:
      engineService - the service used to handle engine operations. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if engineService is null.

  • Method Details

    • getEngineState

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<EngineDto> getEngineState()
      Retrieves the current state of the editor engine.
      Returns:
      the current engine state wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • updateSelection

      @PostMapping("/select") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<EngineDto>> updateSelection(@RequestBody SelectionDto requestedSelection)
      Updates the current selection in the editor.
      Parameters:
      requestedSelection - the selection details sent in the request body.
      Returns:
      the updated engine state wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • cutSelection

      @PostMapping("/cut") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<EngineDto>> cutSelection()
      Executes a cut operation on the currently selected text.
      Returns:
      the updated engine state after the cut operation, wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • copySelection

      @PostMapping("/copy") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<EngineDto>> copySelection()
      Executes a copy operation on the currently selected text.
      Returns:
      the engine state after the copy operation, wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • pasteClipboard

      @PostMapping("/paste") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<EngineDto>> pasteClipboard()
      Pastes the content from the clipboard into the editor at the current cursor position.
      Returns:
      the updated engine state after the paste operation, wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • insertText

      @PostMapping("/insert") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<EngineDto> insertText(@RequestBody String text)
      Inserts the given text at the current cursor position.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to insert, provided in the request body.
      Returns:
      the updated engine state after the insertion, wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • deleteSelectedText

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<EngineDto>> deleteSelectedText()
      Deletes the currently selected text from the editor.
      Returns:
      the updated engine state after the delete operation, wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • replay

      @GetMapping("/replay") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<EngineDto>> replay(int fromMementoIndex)
      Replays actions from a specific memento index.
      Parameters:
      fromMementoIndex - the index from which to replay actions.
      Returns:
      the updated engine state after replaying, wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • undo

      @PostMapping("/undo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<EngineDto>> undo()
      Undoes the last action performed in the editor.
      Returns:
      the updated engine state after the undo operation, wrapped in a ResponseEntity.

    • redo

      @PostMapping("/redo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<EngineDto>> redo()
      Redoes the last undone action in the editor.
      Returns:
      the updated engine state after the redo operation, wrapped in a ResponseEntity.
